vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀμώς, ὁ indecl. (Heb. אָמוֹץ, Isa.1:1; עָמוֹס, Amo.1:1; אָמוֹן, 4Ki.21:18 ff. B)
__1. as in 2Ki, Lc. B (Α. Ἀμμών; Jos., Ἀμμών, "Αμωσσς), Amon: Mat.1:10.
__2. Amos: Luk.3:25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.25;
son of: Nahum (G3486);
father of: Mattathias (G3161)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Amós: (1) padre de Matatías (LUC.3:25); (2) padre de Josías (MAT.1:10)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞摩斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "重擔"
基督的一位先祖(路 3:25)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚摩斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "重担"
基督的一位先祖(路 3:25)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: A-mốt « gánh nặng, kẻ mang gánh nặng », con của Ma-ta-thia. H531

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.21.18;
son of: Manasseh (H4519H) and Meshullemeth (H4922); married to Jedidah (H3040);
father of: Josiah (H2977); also called Amos at Mat.1.10;
